amendment.description: Amendment allows institutions of higher education to grow or cultivate industrial hemp for the purpose of agricultural or academic research. Amendment applies only to states that already permit industrial hemp growth and cultivation under state law.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 37 printed in part B of House Report 113-117 to allow institutions of higher education to grow or cultivate industrial hemp for the purpose of agricultural or academic research. The amendment would only apply to states that already permit industrial hemp growth and cultivation under state law.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A033) Agreed to by recorded vote: 225 - 200 (Roll no. 269).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A033) Agreed to by recorded vote: 225 - 200 (Roll no. 269).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A033) offered by Mr. Polis.
